entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 01:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow with rain this evening and with freezing rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
